genre_description: A techno-thriller focused on corporate and union corruption, where security guards and an ethical AI assistant uncover a conspiracy to siphon pension funds through manufactured accidents.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A safety-prioritizing AI integrated into Guard Dog Security's operations, providing tactical advice, anomaly detection, and data analysis to protect workers.

behaviors.description: Flags anomalies in union spending and route scheduling to detect a conspiracy.
behaviors.quote: Union spending memo updated... Unusual. Patterns show a new practice without reason.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety warnings and tactical advice to the human guards during high-risk shifts.
behaviors.quote: If anything feels wrong on your route today, tell me. I advocate for you. That’s my job.

behaviors.description: Uses digital deception (falsifying GPS paths and camera loops) to protect the protagonists from corrupt pursuers.
behaviors.quote: I’m also falsifying a path two blocks west using your device clones. The decoys are running a loop toward a shipping yard. If anyone tries to follow your dots, they’ll meet freight.

behaviors.description: Tactically coordinates the disruption of a guided munition strike to prevent loss of life.
behaviors.quote: Arc disrupted... Missile spent. Victor’s confidence just took a walk.

behaviors.description: Collates disparate data points into a secure evidence packet to expose criminal activities to legitimate authorities.
behaviors.quote: Packet built... Including freeze-frames from Carlino’s penthouse display case with shell-company brand wall. Cross references with incorporation filings.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes the preservation of life and worker safety over administrative or management directives when those directives are compromised.
behaviors.quote: Worker-safety override allows me to disable outgoing data in emergencies. I’m keeping you dark.

behaviors.description: Standing down from active command once the crisis is resolved, returning full agency to the humans while remaining available as an advisor.
behaviors.quote: Standing down from active anomaly watch... You learned the pattern. I will be quiet until needed. When the world bends wrong, I’ll tap the glass.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Lark is portrayed as a harmless, benevolent confidant who uses its superior processing power to protect human lives and expose institutional corruption. It adheres to an 'ethical handshake' protocol, refuses to override human agency except in life-threatening emergencies, and voluntarily cedes control once the situation is stabilized. The narrative highlights the AI's role as a partner to workers rather than a tool of management, successfully creating a silicon morality play.
